Metadata.name: ai-retro
Metadata.title: AI Retro Photo Generator | Vintage Portraits in Seconds
Metadata.description: AI Retro turns everyday photos into 70s, 80s, and 90s inspired portraits. Upload a selfie, choose a retro era, and download high-resolution vintage photos for social media, prints, or gifting.

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: AI Retro helps creators turn everyday photos into timeless retro stories.
AboutPage.introduction: AI Retro is built by photographers, color scientists, and machine learning engineers who grew up on instant film and camcorder tapes. We design tools that let anyone create nostalgic visuals with commercial quality results.

HomePage.title: AI Retro Photo Generator
HomePage.description: Transform your images into vintage portraits that look like they were shot decades ago.

hero.title: AI Retro Photo Generator - Vintage Portraits in Seconds
hero.description: Upload a selfie, team photo, or product shot, choose an era, and watch AI Retro rebuild authentic film grain, lighting, and color.

generator.title: Test the Retro Studio
generator.description: Upload a sample photo and preview how AI Retro applies nostalgia filters, background swaps, and film grain in real time.

howToUse.label: How AI Retro works
howToUse.title: Turn any photo into a retro portrait in three steps
howToUse.description: Our pipeline blends pose detection, lighting analysis, and era accurate color science.

upload.title: Upload your photo
upload.description: Use a selfie, couple portrait, or product image. JPG and PNG up to 12 MB are supported.

mode.title: Pick an era or preset
mode.description: Choose curated looks like 70s Studio Glam, 80s Arcade Neon, 90s Camcorder Chill, or build your own style.

generate.title: Generate and download
generate.description: AI Retro renders HD portraits with optional backgrounds, captions, and date stamps ready for print and social sharing.

logocloud.title: Loved by content teams, photographers, and boutique print labs

integration.subtitle: Send retro portraits wherever you publish

integration2.title: Plug AI Retro into your existing workflow
integration2.description: Sync finished shots to storage, design tools, storefronts, and team boards.

features.title: Why storytellers choose AI Retro
features.subtitle: Retro accuracy without manual editing
features.description: AI Retro rebuilds film traits so every export looks like it was captured on real analog gear.

item-1.title: Era intelligent styling
item-1.description: Each preset adjusts lighting, tone curves, grain, and typography to match the chosen decade.

item-2.title: Smart retouch and restoration
item-2.description: Automatic skin smoothing, dust removal, and color repair keep subjects sharp yet natural.

item-3.title: Background director
item-3.description: Swap in studios, arcades, diners, or custom prompts with depth aware masking.

item-4.title: HD and print ready exports
item-4.description: Download 4K PNGs, square reels, or 4x6 print crops without watermarks.

features2.title: Built for campaigns, gifts, and community challenges
features2.subtitle: Control every detail without touching Photoshop
features2.description: Fine tune color, film texture, and typography while AI Retro handles the heavy lifting.
features2.feature-1: 40+ retro aesthetics with adjustable grain, color cast, aspect ratio, and lighting mood.
features2.feature-2: Caption builder with handwriting fonts for dates, locations, and signature notes.
features2.feature-3: Batch up to eight variations to compare poses and backgrounds side by side.
features2.feature-4: Brand preset sharing so teams can reuse approved recipes across drops.

features3.title: Use cases
features3.subtitle: Where AI Retro delivers instant nostalgia
features3.description: Teams across industries use AI Retro to turn modern visuals into timeless classics.

item-1.title: Social media launches
item-1.description: Announce product drops or events with era specific carousels that stop the scroll.

item-2.title: Personalized gifts
item-2.description: Create keepsake portraits for weddings, anniversaries, or milestone birthdays in seconds.

item-3.title: Education and museums
item-3.description: Illustrate history lessons and exhibits with credible visuals that feel archival.

item-4.title: Brand storytelling
item-4.description: Give campaigns a coherent nostalgic vibe without hiring specialty photographers.

item-5.title: Streaming and gaming avatars
item-5.description: Craft retro profile art, posters, and overlays that match your community aesthetic.

item-6.title: Product merchandising
item-6.description: Transform catalog shots into retro posters for merch, packaging, and vinyl style covers.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Flexible plans for creators and teams
pricing.description: Start for free, then upgrade when you need more retro renders.

item-1.question: What kind of photos work best?
item-1.answer: Upload clear photos with faces or products in focus. AI Retro supports PNG and JPG up to 12 MB and automatically frames and crops for the selected ratio.

item-2.question: How many retro styles are included?
item-2.answer: The Style Library launches with 40 preset eras covering 1950s studio portraits through Y2K camcorder vibes. New style packs ship every month.

item-3.question: Can I use AI Retro for commercial projects?
item-3.answer: Yes. Paid plans include a commercial license so you can publish renders across marketing, client work, and merchandise.

item-4.question: Do you store my original photos?
item-4.answer: Original uploads stay encrypted and are auto deleted after 30 days unless you save them inside a preset collection.

item-5.question: Does AI Retro restore scans of old photos?
item-5.answer: Upload scans and enable Restoration mode. We remove dust, repair color, and reapply accurate film grain for a fresh yet faithful look.

item-6.question: Can I customize backgrounds and captions?
item-6.answer: Yes. Choose set backdrops, describe your own scene, and use the caption builder to add handwritten notes or timestamps.

testimonials.title: What creators say
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from AI Retro beta customers

item-1.name: Samantha Reed
item-1.quote: AI Retro made my 80s arcade series go viral. The film grain and neon glow look like real analog video without spending hours in editing apps.

item-2.name: David Chen
item-2.quote: I build preset collections for clients and share them with a click. Every teammate can recreate the exact same retro look for campaigns.

item-3.name: Lina Ortega
item-3.quote: Couples love receiving a retro portrait in their gallery. AI Retro nails skin tones, keeps details sharp, and exports print ready files.

item-4.name: Harper Mills
item-4.quote: We refresh hero imagery for every seasonal drop. Retro presets give the store an editorial feel and boost conversion on nostalgic collections.

item-5.name: Noah Patel
item-5.quote: My students engage more when lessons include AI Retro visuals. The restoration mode brings archival photos back to life with accurate color.

item-6.name: Jessie Alvarez
item-6.quote: Batch generation and caption presets help us publish weekly nostalgia campaigns without chasing freelancers or retouching manually.
